short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the spirit of Panda to your browser with this lively new tab extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Panda NewTab is your ultimate browser extension that transforms your new tab experience! Featuring a sleek, user-friendly design, it offers beautiful backgrounds, customizable widgets, and quick access to your favorite websites. Stay organized with a built-in to-do list and calendar, and enjoy motivational quotes to inspire your day. Enhance your browsing with Panda NewTab and make every new tab a refreshing experience!
